bibl.title: A Greek Inscription found near Hefzibah.
bibl.note: Orders issued by King Antiochos III and the junior King Antiochos for the benefit of Ptolemaios, son of Thraseas, ex-commander of the Ptolemaic army at the beginning of the Fourth Syrian War, ca 200 B.C.
bibl.seg: Landau Y.H., A Greek Inscription found near Hefzibah.

Orders issued by King Antiochos III and the junior King Antiochos for the benefit of Ptolemaios, son of Thraseas, ex-commander of the Ptolemaic army at the beginning of the Fourth Syrian War, ca 200 B.C.
